mapper.sql: lid, uid, ltitle, lmoney, lrate, lterm, ltype, lstate, ltime
mapper.insert:
insert into loan
lid,
uid,
ltitle,
lmoney,
lrate,
lterm,
ltype,
lstate,
ltime,
#{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lterm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update loan
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ltitle = #{ltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lmoney = #{lmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lrate = #{lrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lterm = #{lterm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ltype = #{ltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lstate = #{lstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update loan set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ltitle = #{ltitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lmoney = #{lmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lrate = #{lrate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lterm = #{lterm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ltype = #{ltype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lstate = #{lstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ltime = #{ltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where lid = #{lid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
